verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> Now the sons רְאוּבֵ֥ן <WH7205> of Reuben בְּכֽוֹר־ <WH1060> the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הַבְּכוֹר֒ <WH1060> (for he [was] the firstborn וּֽבְחַלְּלוֹ֙ <WH2490> but forasmuch as he defiled יְצוּעֵ֣י <WH3326> bed אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father's נִתְּנָה֙ <WH5414> was given בְּכֹ֣רָת֔וֹ <WH1062> his birthright לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> is not לְהִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <WH3187> and the genealogy is not to be reckoned לַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <WH1062> after the birthright

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Though יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> For Judah גָּבַ֣ר <WH1396> prevailed בְּאֶחָ֔יו <WH251> above his brethren וּלְנָגִ֖יד <WH5057> and of him [came] the chief ruler מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> yet וְהַבְּכֹרָ֖ה <WH1062> but the birthright לְיוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> Joseph ס

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> [I say] of Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel חֲנ֥וֹךְ <WH2585> [were] Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <WH6396> and Pallu חֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <WH3756> and Carmi

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> The sons יוֹאֵ֑ל <WH3100> of Joel שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <WH8098> Shemaiah בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son גּ֥וֹג <WH1463> Gog בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> Shimei בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son
מִיכָ֥ה <WH4318> Micah בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son רְאָיָ֥ה <WH7211> Reaia בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son בַּ֥עַל <WH1168> Baal בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> his son

בְּאֵרָ֣ה <WH880> Beerah בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <WH1540> carried away תִּלְּגַ֥ת פִּלְנְאֶ֖סֶר <WH8407> whom Tilgathpilneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשֻּׁ֑ר <WH804> of Assyria ה֥וּא <WH1931> he נָשִׂ֖יא <WH5387> [captive] he [was] prince לָרֽאוּבֵנִֽי׃ <WH7206> of the Reubenites

וְאֶחָיו֙ <WH251> And his brethren לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔יו <WH4940> by their families בְּהִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <WH3187> was reckoned לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֑ם <WH8435> of their generations הָרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> [were] the chief יְעִיאֵ֖ל <WH3273> Jeiel וּזְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH2148> and Zechariah

וּבֶ֙לַע֙ <WH1106> And Bela בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עָזָ֔ז <WH5811> of Azaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שֶׁ֖מַע <WH8087> of Shema בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאֵ֑ל <WH3100> of Joel ה֚וּא <WH1931> who יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> who dwelt בַּעֲרֹעֵ֔ר <WH6177> in Aroer וְעַד־ <WH5704> even נְב֖וֹ <WH5015> even unto Nebo וּבַ֥עַל מְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1186> and Baalmeon

וְלַמִּזְרָ֗ח <WH4217> And eastward יָשַׁב֙ <WH3427> he inhabited עַד־ <WH5704> far לְב֣וֹא <WH935> unto the entering מִדְבָּ֔רָה <WH4057> in of the wilderness לְמִן־ <WH4480> from הַנָּהָ֖ר <WH5104> from the river פְּרָ֑ת <WH6578> Euphrates כִּ֧י <WH3588> because מִקְנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH4735> because their cattle רָב֖וּ <WH7235> were multiplied בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> of Gilead

וּבִימֵ֣י <WH3117> And in the days שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> of Saul עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> they made מִלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> war עִם־ <WH5973> with הַֽהַגְרִאִ֔ים <WH1905> with the Hagarites וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> who fell בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> by their hand וַיֵּשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> and they dwelt בְּאָ֣הֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH168> in their tents עַֽל־ <WH5921> throughout כָּל־ <WH3605> all פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> throughout מִזְרָ֥ח <WH4217> all the east לַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> [land] of Gilead פ

וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children גָ֣ד <WH1410> of Gad לְנֶגְדָּ֗ם <WH5048> opposite יָֽשְׁב֛וּ <WH3427> dwelt בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> over against them in the land הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> of Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> far סַלְכָֽה׃ <WH5548> unto Salchah

יוֹאֵ֣ל <WH3100> Joel הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> the chief וְשָׁפָ֖ם <WH8223> and Shapham הַמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <WH4932> the next וְיַעְנַ֥י <WH3285> and Jaanai וְשָׁפָ֖ט <WH8202> and Shaphat בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> in Bashan

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֞ם <WH251> And their brethren לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1> of their fathers מִֽיכָאֵ֡ל <WH4317> [were] Michael וּמְשֻׁלָּ֡ם <WH4918> and Meshullam וְ֠שֶׁבַע <WH7652> and Sheba וְיוֹרַ֧י <WH3140> and Jorai וְיַעְכָּ֛ן <WH3275> and Jachan וְזִ֥יעַ <WH2127> and Zia וָעֵ֖בֶר <WH5677> and Heber שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> seven ס

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the children אֲבִיחַ֗יִל <WH32> of Abihail בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חוּרִ֡י <WH2359> of Huri בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יָ֠רוֹחַ <WH3386> of Jaroah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גִּלְעָ֧ד <WH1568> of Gilead בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָאֵ֛ל <WH4317> of Michael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְשִׁישַׁ֥י <WH3454> of Jeshishai בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יַחְדּ֖וֹ <WH3163> of Jahdo בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בּֽוּז׃ <WH938> of Buz

אֲחִי֙ <WH277> Ahi בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַבְדִּיאֵ֣ל <WH5661> of Abdiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גּוּנִ֔י <WH1476> of Guni רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> chief לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <WH3427> And they dwelt בַּגִּלְעָ֥ד <WH1568> in Gilead בַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> in Bashan וּבִבְנֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and in her towns וּבְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all מִגְרְשֵׁ֥י <WH4054> and in all the suburbs שָׁר֖וֹן <WH8289> of Sharon עַל־ <WH5921> far תּוֹצְאוֹתָֽם׃ <WH8444> upon their borders

כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <WH3187> All these were reckoned by genealogies בִּימֵ֖י <WH3117> in the days יוֹתָ֣ם <WH3147> of Jotham מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבִימֵ֖י <WH3117> and in the days יָרָבְעָ֥ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> The sons רְאוּבֵ֨ן <WH7205> of Reuben וְגָדִ֜י <WH1425> and the Gadites וַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <WH7626> the tribe מְנַשֶּׁה֮ <WH4519> of Manasseh מִן־ <WH4480> at בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted חַיִל֒ <WH2428> of valiant men אֲ֠נָשִׁים <WH582> men נֹשְׂאֵ֨י <WH5375> able to bear מָגֵ֤ן <WH4043> buckler וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> and sword וְדֹ֣רְכֵי <WH1869> and to shoot קֶ֔שֶׁת <WH7198> with bow וּלְמוּדֵ֖י <WH3925> and skilful מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> in war אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> and forty וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> [were] four אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <WH7651> seven מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <WH8346> and threescore יֹצְאֵ֥י <WH3318> that went out צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to the war

וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> And they made מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> war עִם־ <WH5973> against הַֽהַגְרִיאִ֑ים <WH1905> with the Hagarites וִיט֥וּר <WH3195> with Jetur וְנָפִ֖ישׁ <WH5305> and Nephish וְנוֹדָֽב׃ <WH5114> and Nodab

וַיֵּעָזְר֣וּ <WH5826> And they were helped עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> against וַיִּנָּתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> were delivered בְיָדָם֙ <WH3027> into their hand הַֽהַגְרִיאִ֔ים <WH1905> against them and the Hagarites וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all שֶׁ֣עִמָּהֶ֑ם <WH5973> with כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֵאלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> to God זָעֲקוּ֙ <WH2199> and all that [were] with them for they cried בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> in the battle וְנַעְתּ֥וֹר <WH6279> and he was intreated לָהֶ֖ם כִּי־ <WH3588> because בָ֥טְחוּ <WH982> of them because they put their trust בֽוֹ׃

וַיִּשְׁבּ֣וּ <WH7617> And they took away מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4735> their cattle גְּֽמַלֵּיהֶ֞ם <WH1581> of their camels חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> fifty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand וְצֹ֗אן <WH6629> and of sheep מָאתַ֤יִם <WH3967> two hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁים֙ <WH2572> and fifty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand וַחֲמוֹרִ֖ים <WH2543> and of asses אַלְפָּ֑יִם <WH505> two thousand וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> any אָדָ֖ם <WH120> man מֵ֥אָה <WH3967> an hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because חֲלָלִ֤ים <WH2491> slain רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> down many נָפָ֔לוּ <WH5307> For there fell כִּ֥י <WH3588> because מֵהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> [was] of God הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> because the war וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> And they dwelt תַחְתֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH8478> their place עַד־ <WH5704> until הַגֹּלָֽה׃ <WH1473> in their steads until the captivity פ

וּבְנֵ֗י <WH1121> And the children חֲצִי֙ <WH2677> of the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh יָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> dwelt בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִבָּשָׁ֞ן <WH1316> from Bashan עַד־ <WH5704> against בַּ֧עַל חֶרְמ֛וֹן <WH1179> unto Baalhermon וּשְׂנִ֥יר <WH8149> and Senir וְהַר־ <WH2022> and unto mount חֶרְמ֖וֹן <WH2768> Hermon הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they רָבֽוּ׃ <WH7235> they increased

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> And these [were] the heads בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers וְעֵ֡פֶר <WH6081> even Epher וְיִשְׁעִ֡י <WH3469> and Ishi וֶאֱלִיאֵ֡ל <WH447> and Eliel וְ֠עַזְרִיאֵל <WH5837> and Azriel וְיִרְמְיָ֨ה <WH3414> and Jeremiah וְהוֹדַוְיָ֜ה <WH1938> and Hodaviah וְיַחְדִּיאֵ֗ל <WH3164> and Jahdiel אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> men גִּבּ֣וֹרֵי <WH1368> mighty חַ֔יִל <WH2428> of valour אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> men שֵׁמ֔וֹת <WH8034> famous רָאשִׁ֖ים <WH7218> [and] heads לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַיִּֽמְעֲל֔וּ <WH4603> And they transgressed בֵּאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> against the God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers וַיִּזְנ֗וּ <WH2181> and went a whoring אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the gods עַמֵּי־ <WH5971> of the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> destroyed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> whom God מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וַיָּעַר֩ <WH5782> stirred up אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> And the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> ר֣וּחַ ׀ <WH7307> the spirit פּ֣וּל <WH6322> of Pul מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֗וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְאֶת־ <WH853> ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> and the spirit תִּלְּגַ֤ת פִּלְנֶ֙סֶר֙ <WH8407> of Tilgathpilneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַיַּגְלֵם֙ <WH1540> and he carried them away לָראוּבֵנִ֣י <WH7206> even the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֔י <WH1425> and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <WH2677> and the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> of Manasseh וַ֠יְבִיאֵם <WH935> and brought לַחְלַ֨ח <WH2477> them unto Halah וְחָב֤וֹר <WH2249> and Habor וְהָרָא֙ <WH2024> and Hara וּנְהַ֣ר <WH5104> and to the river גּוֹזָ֔ן <WH1470> Gozan עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ
